when_to_say: When greeting someone during the day.
example: こんにちは、元気ですか？ (konnichiwa, genki desu ka?) - Hello, how are you?

when_to_say: When expressing gratitude.
example: プレゼントをありがとう。 (purezento o arigatou) - Thank you for the gift.

when_to_say: When talking about or referring to a cat.
example: あの猫はかわいい。 (ano neko wa kawaii) - That cat is cute.

when_to_say: When describing someone or something running.
example: 毎朝公園で走る。 (maiasa kouen de hashiru) - I run in the park every morning.

when_to_say: When describing a quiet environment or person.
example: 図書館はとても静かだ。 (toshokan wa totemo shizuka da) - The library is very quiet.

example: プレゼントをありがとう。 (purezento o arigatou) - Thank you for the gift.

when_to_say: When talking about or referring to a cat.
example: あの猫はかわいい。 (ano neko wa kawaii) - That cat is cute.

when_to_say: When describing someone or something running.
example: 毎朝公園で走る。 (maiasa kouen de hashiru) - I run in the park every morning.

when_to_say: When describing a quiet environment or person.
example: 図書館はとても静かだ。 (toshokan wa totemo shizuka da) - The library is very quiet.
